theTrickster:DaringSlash.NAME: Daring Slash
theTrickster:DaringSlash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Frail. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card.

theTrickster:BackStep.NAME: BackStep
theTrickster:BackStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card.

theTrickster:Parry.NAME: Parry
theTrickster:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Add a Dazed to your discard pile. NL Gain !B! Block.

theTrickster:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
theTrickster:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:BetterSafe.NAME: Better Safe
theTrickster:BetterSafe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Lose 1 Strength. NL Put a copy of this card in your discard pile.

theTrickster:EnhancingDrug.NAME: Enhancing Drug
theTrickster:EnhancingDrug.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength. NL Gain X Dexterity
theTrickster:EnhancingDrug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Strength. NL Gain X+1 Dexterity.

theTrickster:TriedTechniques.NAME: Tried Techniques
theTrickster:TriedTechniques.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, return 1 random card from your discard pile to your hand.
theTrickster:TriedTechniques.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of the turn, return 1 random card from your discard pile to your hand.

theTrickster:RampingUpStrike.NAME: Ramping Up Strike
theTrickster:RampingUpStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage per elapsed turn.

theTrickster:Feint.NAME: Feint
theTrickster:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

theTrickster:BladeSurge.NAME: Blade Surge
theTrickster:BladeSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Deal !D! damage X times.

theTrickster:HandGrenade.NAME: Hand Grenade
theTrickster:HandGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card.
theTrickster:HandGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

theTrickster:KillThemAll.NAME: Kill 'Em all
theTrickster:KillThemAll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Put a copy of this card in your discard pile.

theTrickster:TickingPackage.NAME: Ticking Package
theTrickster:TickingPackage.DESCRIPTION: Target an enemy. At the end of its next turn it takes !M! damage.

theTrickster:RampingUpDefend.NAME: Ramping Up Defend
theTrickster:RampingUpDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block per elapsed turn.

theTrickster:TrickyStrike.NAME: Tricky Strike
theTrickster:TrickyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Defend", even the exhausted ones.

theTrickster:TrickyDefend.NAME: Tricky Defend
theTrickster:TrickyDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block for ALL your cards containing "Strike", even the exhausted ones.

theTrickster:HotSteel.NAME: Hot Steel
theTrickster:HotSteel.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [E]. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Burn into your draw pile.

theTrickster:Repetition.NAME: Repetition
theTrickster:Repetition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile in your hand.

theTrickster:ImpulsiveStrike.NAME: Impulsive Strike
theTrickster:ImpulsiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 2 damage less for each turn that has passed this combat. NL Exhaust.
theTrickster:ImpulsiveStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 2 damage less for each turn that has passed this combat. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:ImpulsiveDefend.NAME: Impulsive Defend
theTrickster:ImpulsiveDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains 2 Block less for each turn that has passed this combat. NL Exhaust.
theTrickster:ImpulsiveDefend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gains 2 Block less for each turn that has passed this combat. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:SmokeOfConfusion.NAME: Smoke Of Confusion
theTrickster:SmokeOfConfusion.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theTrickster:CautiousManeuver.NAME: Cautious Maneuver
theTrickster:CautiousManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! bonus Block if your HP is at or below 50%.

theTrickster:SmokeAndMirrors.NAME: Smoke And Mirrors
theTrickster:SmokeAndMirrors.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Burn into your draw pile.

theTrickster:PlayingWithFire.NAME: Playing With Fire
theTrickster:PlayingWithFire.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Artifact and lose 1 HP.

theTrickster:UpThePace.NAME: Up The Pace
theTrickster:UpThePace.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random 0 cost card of any color to your hand.

theTrickster:Practice.NAME: Practice
theTrickster:Practice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random 0 cost card to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:PistolWhip.NAME: Pistol Whip
theTrickster:PistolWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random 0 cost card of any color to your hand.

theTrickster:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
theTrickster:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Add a random 0 cost card of any color to your hand.

theTrickster:DeepPockets.NAME: Deep Pockets
theTrickster:DeepPockets.DESCRIPTION: Add a random colorless card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
theTrickster:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: The next 0 cost card you play this turn is played twice.
theTrickster:Efficiency.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! 0 cost cards you play this turn are played twice.

theTrickster:FancyCape.NAME: Fancy Cape
theTrickster:FancyCape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Heal 2. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

theTrickster:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
theTrickster:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: If the targeted enemy intends to attack: Gain 2 [E] and draw !M! cards. Exhaust.

theTrickster:MentalStrength.NAME: Mental Strength
theTrickster:MentalStrength.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a Debuff, gain !M! Block.

theTrickster:Firecrackers.NAME: Firecrackers
theTrickster:Firecrackers.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the enemies next turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theTrickster:FirstAidKit.NAME: First Aid Kit
theTrickster:FirstAidKit.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you should lose 2 HP or less, prevent it.

theTrickster:StopTheBleeding.NAME: Stop The Bleeding
theTrickster:StopTheBleeding.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you should lose more than 5 HP, only lose 5 and add a Wound to your discard pile.

theTrickster:SwiftAsTheWind.NAME: Swift As The Wind
theTrickster:SwiftAsTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 3 cards in a single turn, draw a card.
theTrickster:SwiftAsTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Every time you play 3 cards in a single turn, draw a card.

theTrickster:MistForm.NAME: Mist Form
theTrickster:MistForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0 cost card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theTrickster:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
theTrickster:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is at or below 50%, deal the damage 2 times instead of once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL If your HP is at or below 50%, deal the damage 2 times instead of once.

theTrickster:StudiedSnipe.NAME: Studied Snipe
theTrickster:StudiedSnipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage per card in your discard pile.

theTrickster:ForbiddenMedicine.NAME: Forbidden Medicine
theTrickster:ForbiddenMedicine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal !M! HP and add a Wound to your hand.

theTrickster:BulletRain.NAME: Bullet Rain
theTrickster:BulletRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times.

theTrickster:CreateAnOpening.NAME: Create An Opening
theTrickster:CreateAnOpening.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to an enemy. NL Gain !B! Block.

theTrickster:Audacity.NAME: Audacity
theTrickster:Audacity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Wound to your hand.

theTrickster:PreciseSalvo.NAME: Precise Salvo
theTrickster:PreciseSalvo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Costs 1 less for each Artifact you have.

theTrickster:OminousSmile.NAME: Ominous Smile
theTrickster:OminousSmile.DESCRIPTION: Add a wound to your hand. Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theTrickster:LightTrick.NAME: Light Trick
theTrickster:LightTrick.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of the turn lose !M! dexterity.

theTrickster:CapriciousThrust.NAME: Capricious Thrust
theTrickster:CapriciousThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a Status in your hand, deal the damage 2 times instead of once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL If you have a Status in your hand, deal the damage 2 times instead of once.

theTrickster:DivingSlice.NAME: Diving Slice
theTrickster:DivingSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards until you have !M! in hand.

theTrickster:SharpBlade.NAME: Sharp Blade
theTrickster:SharpBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a random Status from you draw pile in your hand.

theTrickster:ThickVest.NAME: Thick Vest
theTrickster:ThickVest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! Block.

theTrickster:Handicraft.NAME: Handicraft
theTrickster:Handicraft.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card in your hand.
theTrickster:Handicraft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand.

theTrickster:BattlePlan.NAME: Battle Plan
theTrickster:BattlePlan.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

theTrickster:DejaVu.NAME: Déjà Vu
theTrickster:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
theTrickster:DejaVu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

theTrickster:SuperiorTactics.NAME: Superior Tactics
theTrickster:SuperiorTactics.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, draw 2 cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
theTrickster:SuperiorTactics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, draw 2 cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

theTrickster:BlurTheLines.NAME: Blur The Lines
theTrickster:BlurTheLines.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Exchange your amounts of Strength and Dexterity.

theTrickster:KeepCool.NAME: Keep Cool
theTrickster:KeepCool.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Weak, Vulnerable and Frail. NL Gain !M! artifact.

theTrickster:EyeForEye.NAME: Eye For Eye
theTrickster:EyeForEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal to an enemy the damage it intends to do as thetrickster:True_Damage.

theTrickster:Impale.NAME: Impale
theTrickster:Impale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card damage.
